attributes.action: Put metal detectors in all High Schools to detect knifes and sharp weapons
attributes.additional_details:
We are losing so many innocent young lives to stabbings. Families are being torn apart, children losing their friends. 

It is nearly every week you hear about a new stabbing now, another young life gone far too soon, this needs to stop!
attributes.background: We have lost control of the youth of today, how do they think it is ok to carry a knife to school and murder another child?

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund all secondary schools to have metal detectors
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/714842
